Saxmundham Library

Manager: Liz Gleave

County Offices, Street Farm Road, Saxmundham
IP17 1AL

Tel: 01728 652440
Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
Friends group: Saxmundham Library Friends

Social media:

  • Facebook

Branch facilities

  • Accessibility information
  • Parking: 6 spaces available, one of which is reserved for disabled customers
  • Customer toilet

IT and printing facilities

  • Free wifi
  • Book a computer
  • Photocopying: available
  • Colour printing: available
  • Scan to email
  • Printing, photocopying & scanning charges
